title: Randi Rhodes Show - March 01 2010
description:

Heck, it took them a good half-hour to set up every shot.  Without curling, if you want to watch inexplicable and arcane competition, youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll just have to pay attention to the healthcare debate. The two sides are preparing their weaponsÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½the healthcare supporters have a routine parliamentary maneuver, and the Republicans have a bunch of lies about a routine parliamentary maneuver. On ABCÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s This Week, Lamar Alexander went off on a lying spree about the use of reconciliation.  Alexander called reconciliation a ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œlittle-used legislative procedureÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ used ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œfor the purpose of taxing, spending, and reducing deficits.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ Taxing and reducing deficits? Under Republicans, reconciliation isnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œlittle used,ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œmisused.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½

Meanwhile today Kentucky Senator Jim Bunning is single-handedly blocking an extension of unemployment benefits. Benefits for 400,000 Americans expired today.  Yeesh. With so many people out of work, why in the name of God does Jim Bunning have a job? Bunning supposedly is concerned about how the unemployment extension is going to be paid for. Jim, there are a lot of people out there wondering the same thing about their utility bills. BunningÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s obstruction also caused two thousand federal transportation workers to be furloughed without pay today. Most causes of unemployment are pretty complicated, but at least one is painfully simpleÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½Jim Bunning. Jim, youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re supposed to be attacking unemployment, not attacking the unemployed! Ironically, another part of the package that Bunning is blocking allows 1.5 million people in rural areas to get local stations on their TV.  Maybe heÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s hoping his constituents wonÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t find out what heÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s done. Just thank God this TV blackout didnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t happen until the curling was over.
